Example: 這是什麼？(Zhè shì shénme?) - What is this?
你的名字是什麼？(Nǐ de míngzì shì shénme?) - What is your first name?
請告訴我你的姓名。(Qǐng gàosù wǒ nǐ de xìngmíng.) - Please tell me your full name.
你呢？(Nǐ ne?) - How about you?
我來自印尼。(Wǒ láizì Yìnní.) - I am from Indonesia.
我喜歡吃水果。(Wǒ xǐhuān chī shuǐguǒ.) - I like to eat fruit.
這是我的新書。(Zhè shì wǒ de xīn shū.) - This is my new book.
他是我的同學。(Tā shì wǒ de tóngxué.) - He is my classmate.
他是老師。(Tā shì lǎoshī.) - He is a teacher.
她是我的朋友。(Tā shì wǒ de péngyǒu.) - She is my friend.
誰在那裡？(Shéi zài nàlǐ?) - Who is there?

這只貓很可愛。(Zhè zhī māo hěn kě'ài.) - This cat is very cute.
哪個是你的書？(Nǎ ge shì nǐ de shū?) - Which one is your book?
我來自哪個國家？(Wǒ láizì nǎ ge guójiā?) - Which country am I from?
你知道他嗎？(Nǐ zhīdào tā ma?) - Do you know him?

我們要去中國。(Wǒmen yào qù Zhōngguó.) - We are going to China.
我想去美國學習。(Wǒ xiǎng qù Měiguó xuéxí.) - I want to study in America.
他是來自英國。(Tā shì láizì Yīngguó.) - He is from England.
她今天看起來很漂亮。(Tā jīntiān kàn qǐlái hěn piàoliàng.) - She looks very pretty today.

我喝水。(Wǒ hē shuǐ.) - I drink water.
我喜歡喝茶。(Wǒ xǐhuān hē chá.) - I like to drink tea.

今天是我的生日。(Jīntiān shì wǒ de shēngrì.) - Today is my birthday.

你來嗎？(Nǐ lái ma?) - Are you coming?

我每天七點起床。(Wǒ měitiān qī diǎn qǐchuáng.) - I get up at 7 o'clock every day.

English: to sleep; to go to bed
Example: 我每天十點睡覺。(Wǒ měitiān shí diǎn shuìjiào.) - I go to bed at 10 o'clock every day.
我最近很忙。(Wǒ zuìjìn hěn máng.) - I have been very busy lately.
我今天很累。(Wǒ jīntiān hěn lèi.) - I am very tired today.
我買了一本書。(Wǒ mǎi le yī běn shū.) - I bought a book.
我送給他一個禮物。(Wǒ sòng gěi tā yī ge lǐwù.) - I gave him a gift.
我想去旅行。(Wǒ xiǎng qù lǚxíng.) - I want to travel.
我送了他一個生日禮物。(Wǒ sòng le tā yī ge shēngrì lǐwù.) - I gave him a birthday gift.
這是我買的兩個書。(Zhè shì wǒ mǎi de liǎng ge shū.) - These are the two books I bought.

English: to read; to look; to watch
Example: 我喜歡看電影。(Wǒ xǐhuān kàn diànyǐng.) - I like to watch movies.
這本書很有趣。(Zhè běn shū hěn yǒuqù.) - This book is very interesting.

他會說英文。(Tā huì shuō Yīngwén.) - He can speak English.

你來啦，啊！(Nǐ lái la, ā!) - You're here, ah!
這是我的書。(Zhè shì wǒ de shū.) - This is my book.
那是我的家。(Nà shì wǒ de jiā.) - That is my home.

她是女性。(Tā shì nǚxìng.) - She is female.

現在是零下五度。(Xiànzài shì líng xià wǔ dù.) - The temperature is minus five degrees.
店員給了我找錢。(Diànyuán gěi le wǒ zhǎo qián.) - The cashier gave me change.

冬天很冷。(Dōngtiān hěn lěng.) - Winter is very cold.
我在商店買東西。(Wǒ zài shāngdiàn mǎi dōngxī.) - I buy things at the store.

我的錢包不見了。(Wǒ de qiánbāo bùjiàn le.) - My wallet is lost.

English: at; in; on; to be located
Example: 我在家。(Wǒ zài jiā.) - I am at home.
你去哪裡？(Nǐ qù nǎlǐ?) - Where are you going?
我喜歡聽音樂。(Wǒ xǐhuān tīng yīnyuè.) - I like to listen to music.
我每天聽音樂。(Wǒ měitiān tīng yīnyuè.) - I listen to music every day.
我今天下午有空。(Wǒ jīntiān xiàwǔ yǒukòng.) - I am free this afternoon.
我喜歡喝下午茶。(Wǒ xǐhuān hē xiàwǔchá.) - I like to drink afternoon tea.
這部電影不錯。(Zhè bù diànyǐng búcuò.) - This movie is not bad.
我們在咖啡廳見面。(Wǒmen zài kāfēitīng jiànmiàn.) - We meet at the café.
那裡很遠。(Nàlǐ hěn yuǎn.) - It's far there.
這裡很安靜。(Zhèlǐ hěn ānjìng.) - It’s very quiet here.

我喜歡巧克力。(Wǒ xǐhuān qiǎokèlì.) - I like chocolate.
我只吃了一半。(Wǒ zhǐ chī le yī bàn.) - I ate only half.
我們去吃飯吧。(Wǒmen qù chīfàn ba.) - Let's go eat.
我跟朋友一起去。(Wǒ gēn péngyǒu yīqǐ qù.) - I am going with my friend.
我很忙，可是我會來。(Wǒ hěn máng, kěshì wǒ huì lái.) - I am busy, but I will come.
這是我的房間。(Zhè shì wǒ de fángjiān.) - This is my room.
我的房子很大。(Wǒ de fángzi hěn dà.) - My house is very big.
我的書在桌子裡面。(Wǒ de shū zài zhuōzi lǐmiàn.) - My books are inside the table.

我買了兩張椅子。(Wǒ mǎi le liǎng zhāng yǐzi.) - I bought two chairs.
書在桌子上面。(Shū zài zhuōzi shàngmiàn.) - The book is on top of the table.
鞋子在桌子下面。(Xiézi zài zhuōzi xiàmiàn.) - The shoes are under the table.

English: next to; by the side of
Example: 餅乾在杯子旁邊。(Bǐnggān zài bēizi pángbiān.) - The cookies are next to the cup.
車站在前面。(Chēzhàn zài qiánmiàn.) - The bus station is ahead.
我的書包在後面。(Wǒ de shūbāo zài hòumiàn.) - My backpack is behind.
我的哥哥很高。(Wǒ de gēge hěn gāo.) - My older brother is tall.
我有一個姐姐。(Wǒ yǒu yī ge jiějie.) - I have an older sister.
我的弟弟很聰明。(Wǒ de dìdi hěn cōngmíng.) - My younger brother is very smart.
我妹妹很可愛。(Wǒ mèimei hěn kě'ài.) - My younger sister is very cute.
我們的沙發很舒服。(Wǒmen de shāfā hěn shūfú.) - Our sofa is very comfortable.
我可以幫你。(Wǒ kěyǐ bāng nǐ.) - I can help you.
我在找我的手機。(Wǒ zài zhǎo wǒ de shǒujī.) - I am looking for my phone.
廚房在房子裡面。(Chúfáng zài fángzi lǐmiàn.) - The kitchen is inside the house.
我們再試一次。(Wǒmen zài shì yīcì.) - Let's try again.
我在床上睡覺。(Wǒ zài chuáng shàng shuìjiào.) - I sleep on the bed.
我們買了新家具。(Wǒmen mǎi le xīn jiājù.) - We bought new furniture.
他在看電視。(Tā zài kàn diànshì.) - He is watching TV.
我們的窗戶很大。(Wǒmen de chuānghù hěn dà.) - Our window is very big.
門開著。(Mén kāi zhe.) - The door is open.
我有一隻貓。(Wǒ yǒu yī zhī māo.) - I have a cat.
他養了一隻狗。(Tā yǎng le yī zhī gǒu.) - He raised a dog.
我看到一隻鳥。(Wǒ kàn dào yī zhī niǎo.) - I saw a bird.

English: to hit; to beat; to play (ball games)
Example: 我喜歡打籃球。(Wǒ xǐhuān dǎ lánqiú.) - I like to play basketball.
他在打網球。(Tā zài dǎ wǎngqiú.) - He is playing tennis.
我們每週打籃球。(Wǒmen měi zhōu dǎ lánqiú.) - We play basketball every week.
他的最愛是棒球。(Tā de zuì ài shì bàngqiú.) - His favorite is baseball.
我喜歡踢足球。(Wǒ xǐhuān tī zúqiú.) - I like to play soccer.
他踢足球踢得很好。(Tā tī zúqiú tī de hěn hǎo.) - He kicks soccer very well.
我們去海邊玩。(Wǒmen qù hǎibiān wán.) - We go to the beach to play.
這裡的風景很美。(Zhèlǐ de fēngjǐng hěn měi.) - The scenery here is beautiful.
我們爬了山。(Wǒmen pá le shān.) - We climbed the mountain.
我學會了游泳。(Wǒ xuéhuì le yóuyǒng.) - I learned how to swim.
我會說中文。(Wǒ huì shuō zhōngwén.) - I can speak Chinese.
他游泳游得很快。(Tā yóuyǒng yóu de hěn kuài.) - He swims very fast.
我每天跑步。(Wǒ měitiān pǎobù.) - I run every day.
他喜歡跑步。(Tā xǐhuān pǎobù.) - He likes to run.
我跑得很慢。(Wǒ pǎo de hěn màn.) - I run very slowly.
他跑得很快。(Tā pǎo de hěn kuài.) - He runs very fast.
我想說中文。(Wǒ xiǎng shuō zhōngwén.) - I want to speak Chinese.
我們可以說話嗎？(Wǒmen kěyǐ shuōhuà ma?) - Can we talk?
我昨天看了一部電影。(Wǒ zuótiān kàn le yī bù diànyǐng.) - I watched a movie yesterday.
我們去電影院看電影。(Wǒmen qù diànyǐngyuàn kàn diànyǐng.) - We go to the movie theater to watch a movie.
這部電影很有趣。(Zhè bù diànyǐng hěn yǒuqù.) - This movie is very interesting.
我覺得這個地方很漂亮。(Wǒ juéde zhège dìfāng hěn piàoliàng.) - I think this place is beautiful.
我有點累。(Wǒ yǒudiǎn lèi.) - I am a little tired.
我休息了一會兒。(Wǒ xiūxi le yī huǐr.) - I took a rest for a while.
我晚上會上網。(Wǒ wǎnshàng huì shàngwǎng.) - I will surf the internet in the evening.
我的電腦壞了。(Wǒ de diànnǎo huài le.) - My computer is broken.
我的手機很新。(Wǒ de shǒujī hěn xīn.) - My cellphone is very new.
你應該多喝水。(Nǐ yīnggāi duō hē shuǐ.) - You should drink more water.
我每天早上運動。(Wǒ měitiān zǎoshàng yùndòng.) - I exercise every morning.
你可以來我的家。(Nǐ kěyǐ lái wǒ de jiā.) - You can come to my house.
我騎自行車去學校。(Wǒ qí zìxíngchē qù xuéxiào.) - I ride my bike to school.
我有一輛腳踏車。(Wǒ yǒu yī liàng jiǎotàchē.) - I have a bicycle.
我只想要水。(Wǒ zhǐ xiǎng yào shuǐ.) - I only want water.
後天是星期天。(Hòutiān shì xīngqítiān.) - The day after tomorrow is Sunday.
前天我去了市場。(Qiántiān wǒ qù le shìchǎng.) - I went to the market the day before yesterday.
我對音樂有興趣。(Wǒ duì yīnyuè yǒu xìngqù.) - I am interested in music.
你有幾個兄弟姐妹？(Nǐ yǒu jǐ ge xiōngdì jiěmèi?) - How many siblings do you have?
我想學中文。(Wǒ xiǎng xué zhōngwén.) - I want to learn Chinese.
我學習英文。(Wǒ xuéxí Yīngwén.) - I study English.
她喜歡唱歌。(Tā xǐhuān chànggē.) - She likes to sing.
這首歌很好聽。(Zhè shǒu gē hěn hǎotīng.) - This song is very nice.
這首歌很流行。(Zhè shǒu gē hěn liúxíng.) - This song is very popular.
這個怎麼做？(Zhège zěnme zuò?) - How is this done?
我到學校了。(Wǒ dào xuéxiào le.) - I arrived at school.

English: to get on a bus; to get in a car
to get off a bus; to get out of a car
